roleset.name: grant tolerance
roleset.note: LEEWAY-N NOTES: Based on ontonouns. Comparison with allow.01. Framed by Katie. (from leeway.01-n)

role.descr: thing allowed to take place, topic/location of margin granted

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Wulf surmised that he was making up his leeway in the matter.
